alert.note: Alert for Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 11:56PM CDT until June 11 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL NEOSHO COUNTY... At 1155 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Galesburg, or 6 miles southwest of Erie, moving southeast at 20 mph. A second storm was entering the warned area from the northwest and was located just northwest of Chanute. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chanute, Erie, St. Paul, Thayer, Galesburg, Earlton and Lake Parsons. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
